benchmark_details.name: FaceXBench
benchmark_details.overview: FaceXBench is a comprehensive benchmark designed to evaluate Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) on complex face understanding tasks, comprising 5,000 multimodal multiple-choice questions derived from public datasets and a newly created dataset, FaceXAPI.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To systematically evaluate the face understanding capabilities of MLLMs across various tasks and identify their limitations.

data.source: Derived from 25 public datasets and includes the newly created dataset FaceXAPI.
data.annotation: Carefully and manually filtered VQA-type questions.

methodology.interpretation: The benchmark scores indicate the models' capabilities across various face understanding tasks.
methodology.validation: Extensive evaluation of 26 open-source MLLMs and 2 proprietary models.
